  Welcome Home Jenny Sutter  the Masquer Theater

The theatredepartments latest production Welcome Home Jenny Sutter deals with an Iraq war veteran who fails to receive a warm welcome upon returning from deployment PERIOD In lieu of attending her family reunion she hangs out in the desert with a bunch of miscreants PERIOD Hilarity and tragedy most likely ensues PERIOD  for adults  for seniors and students  for children under  PERIOD  pm PERIOD

 KBGA Residency  the VFW

The final night of KBGAs VFW residency ensures theyll be going out with a bang PERIOD Billingsbased spud rockers Idaho Green will be playing along with locals FUULS and Crooked Cops PERIOD Show your support by slamming into one another PERIOD  PERIOD  for   for  PERIOD  p.m PERIOD

 Don  the Quixotes  the Palace

We all know that we cant surf here PERIOD That wave doesnt count stop trying to tell me it counts because it doesnt. but for whatever reason Missoula loves surf rock probably even more than Californians PERIOD Get your surf fix at the Palace Lounge this Saturday with Portlands Don  the Quixotes with locals FUULS and Mass FM PERIOD  PERIOD No cover PERIOD  p.m PERIOD

 The Unrideables  the UC Theater

If youre into snowboarding and you probably are look no further the Red Bullsponsored skiingsnowboarding movie The Unrideables will be screening for free at the UC Theater PERIOD Decompress before finals by loading yourself with caffeine and watching a bunch of firstperson shots of people risking their lives on snow PERIOD All ages PERIOD No cover PERIOD  pm PERIOD

michael.siebertumontana.edu
